description: Abagize umuryango ndetse n’abana bagomba gukaraba intoki neza bakore-sheje amazi meza n’isabune igihe cyose bakoze mu myanda, bavuye mu musarani, mbere yo gutegura no gufata amafunguro.
title: Abagize umuryango ndetse n’abana bagomba gukaraba intoki neza bakore-sheje amazi meza n’isabune igihe cyose bakoze mu myanda, bavuye mu musarani, mbere yo gutegura no gufata amafunguro.
content:
Abagize umuryango ndetse n’abana bagomba gukaraba intoki neza bakore-sheje amazi meza n’isabune igihe cyose bakoze mu myanda, bavuye mu musarani, mbere yo gutegura no gufata amafunguro. 
Gukaraba intoki hakoreshejwe amazi n’isabune bivanaho udukoko twanduza kuko bituma tutajya mu biryo cyangwa mu kanwa. Birinda kandi kurwara inzoka zo munda. Amazi n’isabune bigomba gushyirwa ha y’umusarani kugirango byorohereze umaze kuwukoresha gukaraba intoki.
